transformed_texts:
I think the Catholic Church needs to change some of its views. The Church is losing followers because many people think it is not accepting of some things. This includes same-sex marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these issues, but they may seem old-fashioned to some people.

If the Church were to change its views and think more like people today, it might not lose followers. Many people disagree with the Church's views and do not want to be a part of it. The Church is against abortion, which can be a problem for people who think abortion is okay. The same is true for gay marriage. If someone believes in gay marriage, they might not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.

I do not see why priests cannot be married or why there cannot be female priests. The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a job and a family. So why can't priests have both? It is hard to know for sure if the Church would be different if priests could get married or if there were women priests.

I think the Church should be more open to new ideas. It should think about what people want and need. This might help the Church keep its followers.

I agree with same-sex marriage. I believe people are born gay or straight. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be blamed for their sexual orientation. It is not right to say one sex can marry but not the other.

I think it is not up to people to decide who can get married. We all have different choices in life. But it is not a choice if you are born gay. I was born straight, and my friend was born gay. We did not choose it.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can or cannot get married. Marriage and love are personal things. The government should not judge people's love.

People should be free to love whoever they want. We should not punish them for being different. The federal government should not interfere in people's personal lives. They should only worry about the country's security and laws.

I think same-sex marriage is a right. Everyone should be equal and have the same rights. We should not blame people for who they are.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 
There is no good reason not to. 
Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family, but this is not true. 
Gay couples are different, but that does not mean they are bad. 
It's like two different sides of the same coin. 
Heads will never be tails, but they are the same in many ways. 
Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. 
For example, property taxes and health care. 
If you are in a gay couple, your partner cannot visit you in the hospital because they are not considered family. 
This is unfair. 
Many scientific studies have been done, and they show that gay couples are just like straight couples. 
They have the same factors that contribute to happiness in their relationships. 
It's just a relationship, and it should be treated as such. 
Gay couples are not asking for the right to get married in a church. 
They are asking for a marriage certificate from the government. 
If the government allows a civil union, it should allow a marriage. 
Separate but unequal is not fair. 
Gay couples are the same in many ways, like the roles they play in their relationships. 
People worry about adoption issues and community issues, but these are not reasons to deny gay couples the right to marry. 
They also worry about children of gay couples, but this is not a good reason to deny them rights. 
Children of gay couples are just like any other children. 
They are treated unfairly in some places, like in New York City. 
There are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in public school. 
Parents protest to get their child removed from school because they are gay. 
But this is not fair. 
Parenting skills are the same for gay couples as for straight couples. 
The federal government should be involved in this issue and make gay marriage legal in every state. 
President Bush has strong views on this issue, but his views are based on his religion. 
This is not fair. 
The government should not make laws based on one person's or one group's morality. 
It should consider the morality of all Americans. 
The recent controversy over "Under God" in the Pledge of Allegiance shows that Americans have different ideas about morality. 
The government should not enforce one group's standards on the whole country. 
People are anti-gay and anti-gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. 
But this is not true. 
The American Psychological Association says so. 
We should listen to research and studies, not just our neighbors and friends. 
If we did, we would see the world in a different way.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. This summer job has made me think. Just because a medicine is not allowed does not mean it has good qualities. My answer is no to making it available to the public. However, for medical reasons, I think yes. It is not true that a medicine is bad just because it is not allowed. Many medicines that are not allowed are used in the pharmacy because they have good qualities. We use medicines like oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. These medicines are controlled. They are good and we use them. If we do not allow marijuana because of a bad image, that is not fair. I think we should accept its good qualities.

A bad image of marijuana exists because it is not allowed. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. It is not as bad as many other medicines. If we change our idea of marijuana being a bad thing, people might use it responsibly. They might use it for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed to adapt to the new century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on weekends. We would go to church together.

The church service is now thirty minutes long. People dress casually, even in summer when they come straight from the beach. Families arrive late, and some wear jeans and khakis. The atmosphere has become more casual.

As for other things, this is what I have noticed about the church I know. I do not know the church's politics and rules.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests and pedophilia, I do not think these problems could have been stopped. There are married men who become pedophiles, and their attraction to young children is a personal issue, not because of their marriage status.

When someone chooses to be a priest, it is their decision. Some religions allow their leaders to be married, but it does not prevent pedophilia. A person's sexuality is based on genetics. It is not something they become due to their upbringing. Genetics are something you are born with. You cannot hide it by getting married.

The church cannot prevent pedophilia. If they knew about it and tried to cover it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they were always aware of these problems.

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was unhappy with the idea of going to war in Iraq. Many people were still sad about the attacks on the United States in September 2001. The US government said the Iraq war was connected to those attacks, but this was not true. They also said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but this was also not true.

I was unhappy that the US government lied to the people. Even someone who helped convince the world to go to war, Colin Powell, said he did not believe the evidence. This is not honest. I think it is wrong for government leaders to lie to people.

The US government does not respect the rules of the country. They want to do what they want, not what the rules say. Since 2001, they have been trying to make it harder for people to have their rights.

When the Bush family came into office, they wanted to go to war. One of their advisors said that the younger Bush wanted to get revenge against Saddam Hussein because of a problem from the past.

Now, the war has been going on for a long time. If the US leaves now, there could be a lot of fighting in Iraq and many more people could die. A group of countries, including the US, are trying to work together to fix the problem. They want countries in the area to help keep peace in Iraq. However, this could also cause problems in the long run because Iraq's leaders are not in control.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The people in charge do not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control, and this is causing problems.

I do not know what the solution is. I do not have a good answer to this problem.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. 

At first, I thought it was pointless because it was not officially declared as a war. I felt like the United States wanted revenge because Iraq was responsible for the 9/11 attacks. 

It is hard for me to keep up with the details of the war, but I know that we are trying to build democracy in Iraq so it can be like the United States. We also want their oil. However, staying there makes everyone unhappy.

If we stay, we will have to build democracy, which takes a long time. If we leave, they will be angry with us because we made their lives harder. 

I do not know what to say about this topic. This is one thing I do not understand.

I think the war should continue, but I do not think we should call it a war anymore. I think we use guns to show our power and to prove we are strong. 

I do not think it is fair to call it a war because it was not declared by Congress. We have to declare war to Congress to make it official.

I think it is a good idea to stay in Iraq and help them, but it is also a waste of resources. It is making President Bush look bad. 

The Vietnam War was also an undeclared war, and it was a waste of time. I do not want this war to be remembered as a meaningless war.

I want the war to end, but I also do not want to leave because I know people I care about are in Iraq. They have families and children who do not have a safe place to go to school. 

However, if we stay, we will be trying to change their culture to be like ours, which will make things worse. The Al-Kaida group will become stronger and more angry at the United States. 

I think this war will last for a long time.

I do not agree with making a law against something. It is not for a state to decide. The United States Constitution says the government and churches should be separate. This is a clear law.

Trying to make a law against this is not right. It would go against what the Constitution says. The people making this law are choosing one church's beliefs over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support it. They think it is wrong.

The separation of church and state is very important. It makes America a place where people can believe what they want. The founders of America wanted this. They made it clear in the Constitution.

I do not think the government should make a law about what churches can and cannot do. This would be the only law that takes away people's freedom, not the government's. It would be wrong to do this.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president's ideas about this law are personal, not good for the country. He is pushing for the law because of his own beliefs as a Catholic. This is not fair to other people who believe differently.

There is no good reason for this law. It will not help the economy. It might even help society. I do not think we should make a law like this. It is up to the churches to decide what is right, not the government.

The war in Iraq was a complicated situation. Some people think the government was not honest with Americans about why the war started. Before the war, the government suggested a connection between the invasion of Iraq and the 9/11 attacks. However, the two events are not closely related.

The United States invaded Iraq in 2003. I do not support war. I think the war was a mistake. It is like the Vietnam War. The US government learned from its mistakes in Vietnam, but it did not use this knowledge in Iraq.

Many American soldiers died in the war. This is very sad. The US government took out the Iraqi government, but it was not prepared for what happened after that. There was a power vacuum and chaos. The US tried to put a democratic government in Iraq, but this was a difficult process.

The US government should have known that the war would be hard to win. It was not a clear victory. We were fighting against the Iraqi people, not a regular army. Many people in Iraq did not want the US to be there. It's hard to defeat people who are fighting for their country.

I think the US government should not have gone to war. If it did, it should have planned carefully for all possible outcomes. The government was not well prepared for what happened after the Iraqi government was removed. We are still in Iraq and many American soldiers are still dying. The US is trying to train Iraqi soldiers and police, but this takes a long time.

The US government tried to make the American people believe that the war would be easy and successful. But democracy is not easy to create. It took the US many years to develop its own democratic government. The government should have been honest with the American people about the difficulties of creating a new government in Iraq.

It is hard to decide what to do in Iraq. We have been there for a long time, and we cannot just leave now. We took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. But we must also consider the many American soldiers who have died. We should try to finish what we started, but we must think about the cost.

One of the main reasons for the invasion was to make Iraq a democratic country. But why did we not do the same thing in other countries? The reason is often oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason for the war was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but these were never found. We did know that North Korea had weapons of mass destruction, but we did not invade that country.

I just hope that the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace there. But this does not seem likely.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. I have always thought this. I believe it is a personal preference. Many scientists now think that a person's sexual preference is not because of their family or society, but because of their biology. I think this is a good reason to give them equal rights.

I do not think the government should say who can get married. Marriage is a personal thing, not something the government should decide. I have friends who are gay but not married. They behave just like any other family. They walk their dogs and live like everyone else.

I do not think it is right for someone like President Bush to tell us what marriage means. I think this is too much power for one person. I have read and heard that some scientists think that being gay is because of a chemical in the brain that is not normal in most people.

I think there are many reasons why people are gay. It is not just because of how they were raised. If two people love each other, they should be able to get married without anyone bothering them.

It is not fair that gay couples have to get married in secret, like in Las Vegas. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. I think marriage should be a private thing, not something the whole country talks about.

When you put something on the internet, it is public information. Everyone can see it. You cannot keep it private. As a resident advisor, I have dealt with this problem before.

When you put something on the internet, people will think about you in a certain way. If you talk about violence or trouble, someone will notice. You cannot control what people think. The internet is seen by many people. If someone is your friend on Myspace or Facebook, they will see your bulletin.

The school must know about this. They must take action. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it. It's very important.

However, it's hard to know what to take seriously. Some people joke around. It could be a test gone wrong, like one we did in school for our sociology class. Or it could be something very serious.

In our situation, someone overheard someone talking and called the school. We found the person and looked at their Facebook page. They had some things on there that might be funny, but now they are serious.

The internet is public. If you don't want people to see something, don't put it there. You cannot control what people think. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at their personal pages. But if something is brought to their attention, they must take it seriously.

For example, if a teacher makes a fake account and friends students, that's not right. It's the same as spying. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to see their personal pictures or know what they are doing. It's not my job.

The school must take care of problems they find. But they should not be looking at students' private information.

I think the war has gone on for too long. The purpose was good at the start. We wanted to help a country with no fair government. But now I am not sure we are doing this for the right reasons. We may be fighting just to show that we are strong.

I think our motives were once good. We wanted to help a country with no freedom. But now I think we are fighting for other things. It started with a good reason, but now I am not sure. It makes me think of the past when we had problems with other leaders, like Saddam Hussein.

I think we made our point early on. Starting the war was a strong statement. But it has gone on for many years. I think that is too long. We should have stopped a long time ago.

If our goal was to help a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But I do not think that is why we are fighting now. I think we are fighting just to fight. We want to win, but we do not have a clear victory.

I think it is time to stop the war. The country we are fighting for will soon have to take care of itself. We should be spending our money on our own problems, like poverty and poor schools. We have many problems that need our help.

We are spending billions of dollars on the war. This money could be used for better things, like building roads or helping people get health care. We should be using our money to improve our own country, not to fight a war that we are not winning.

I think that is all I want to say about this.

I have a question. It is about online privacy. On the internet, it is easy to see information that people put on websites like Myspace. If you post something on the internet, it is likely that many people will see it.

Myspace is a website where you can list your friends. You need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But when you add someone as a friend, you are giving them permission to see your information. So, if you put something on the internet, you should understand that many people will see it.

It is hard to have someone check all students' online profiles to prevent problems. But if someone finds something bad by accident, is that good or bad? It depends on the situation. If someone is looking for something bad, it is not good. But if they just happened to see it by chance, it might be good that they did.

I have a Facebook account. It bothers me that people can see things about me. There was a TV show about a man who wanted to show how easy it is to get information. He got a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger in just a minute. I wouldn't meet someone like that.

It is hard to know who can see your information online. You put your class schedule and photos, and people can know a lot about you. I limit what I put on my Facebook, but I also want to be able to talk to my friends.

My roommate told me that her high school banned Myspace. I am not sure if that was right. I don't know if they had the power to tell students they couldn't have Myspace.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. I want to talk about it. But I feel strange saying it now. Many people already said they were against the war from the start. I also said I was against it. However, I think it's not as important now.

I looked at many polls. People from the United States, Iraq, and all over the world said the war was a bad idea. More than 75% of the world's population thinks so. Most Iraqis, American soldiers, and even people from the United States agree with them.

The war started as a bad situation. It became worse. Now, pulling out is a difficult problem. The US and the Middle East have big cultural differences. It's hard to understand each other.

The US government thought they could bring democracy to Iraq easily. But Iraqis want to make their own decisions. They don't want democracy forced on them. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but that's no reason to go to war.

Before going to war, we should think about the advantages and disadvantages. We should not invade a country and make it a disaster. The situation in Iraq is like quicksand. It's hard to get out.

I don't see a good reason to stay in Iraq any longer. The Iraqi people want us to leave. They even think we should leave now. We are trying to help them, but they're telling us to go. I think they know better.

If we ask the Iraqis if they want us to leave, and they say yes, then we can't blame them if things go wrong. If we decide to help them later, we can be seen as the good guys. But, unfortunately, it's hard to be the good guys in the Middle East.

I think the United States still has a problem with gender discrimination. This problem exists in many areas, but it is worse in some jobs than others. The issue is not just with women. Men can also face discrimination in certain jobs.

For example, some men have trouble getting promoted to higher positions because they work for women. This is because society has always seen men as the leaders. As a result, people have a hard time accepting men working for women.

In other areas like fashion, men who like fashion are often looked down upon. People think it's not a typical job for men. And if a man is a stay-at-home parent, society sees it as strange. They think he should be working and bringing home the money.

In some industries, people don't take men seriously if they are into fashion. They think that men who like fashion are different. This can make it hard for men to succeed in these jobs.

Gender discrimination is a problem in the United States. It will take a lot of time to change. But we can see some progress. More women are becoming leaders and getting accepted in the business world. More men are staying home to raise their children, and people are starting to see this as a good thing.

We need to promote the qualities of people who are often seen as different. We should not force people to accept these qualities, but instead, let them see the good things about these people. If we do this slowly, people will start to accept them.

It's not just about men and women. People from different places and with different backgrounds can also face discrimination. For example, someone from a farm who doesn't have perfect grammar can still be a great leader. But other people might look down on him because of his grammar.

In conclusion, the United States still has a problem with gender and social discrimination. But we can make progress if we do things slowly and promote the qualities of people who are often seen as different.

Decriminalizing marijuana means making it not a criminal offense. This means people who use it will get a ticket, not arrested. This is a good idea because it saves money for the government. They do not have to pay for court cases and jails. In a place like Denver, where people are open-minded, this is a good idea. The city can use the saved money for important things like education, social programs, and food for the homeless.

However, some people are concerned about the effects of marijuana. They think it should not be everywhere. Some people worry that if it is legalized, people will smoke it and drive, which is not safe. Many people still do not like the idea of smoking marijuana in public.

Alcohol and marijuana both have bad effects. Alcohol can hurt your ability to drive. Marijuana can affect how people live their lives. But people react differently to these substances. Some people can use them and be fine, while others have problems.

It is hard to say how people will react to marijuana because everyone is different. But one thing is true: both alcohol and marijuana have bad effects.

I agree with you. Here's why: Many things they do are traditional. They have done them for a long time. This is good. It's also important to change and adapt. 

A lot of Catholics go to church every week. They are very strict about how things are done. Sometimes, they look down on people who do not follow their rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my parents were not married in a Catholic church. My mom was a Catholic, and my dad was not. This was not because of my dad's religion, but because the church did not accept him.

Catholic teaching says to love others. But some Catholic practices go against this teaching. This is because they are out of date. They continue to follow these practices anyway.

I do not think this would influence me. I think it would be good if priests could marry. But I do not think this would stop them from hurting children. It is a different situation. They would probably still do bad things.

Some people who hurt children will do it no matter what. They will do it because they are hurting a child, not a partner. If they want to do something bad, they will do it. Getting married or not will not stop them.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop these bad things from happening. They would probably still happen.

I am not sure about this problem. I do not have enough information to say who is right or wrong. This is a difficult issue. 

It is about the separation of church and state, and how to define marriage. It is hard to do this without hurting anyone's feelings. I think civil unions are a good idea. But I do not know if marriage should be a civil union.

Marriage is a very important thing. It is when two people join together. The government should not care about the type of marriage. It should just be a union of two people. 

Some people want to get married because of their church. But the government should not care about this. It is not fair to say some people can get married and others cannot.

The issue of gay marriage is similar. Two people who love each other should be able to join together. I do not think it is right to say no to this.

If many states agree on this, they should try to make it a law for the whole country. But making a change to the constitution to stop gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution should not be changed for a small issue like this.

I do not think it is important enough to change the constitution. It should only be changed for very big reasons. 

I do not think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. This is why I have mixed feelings about homosexuality. I have many gay friends, and I think being gay is a personal choice. However, I do not agree with this lifestyle. I do think it should be legal. I do not think it is a national issue. Instead, I believe each state should decide for itself.

I think some states are more democratic and some are more republican. Democratic states will probably support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you probably know how the people feel about gay marriage. If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that decision. You chose to live there, so you should be willing to accept the laws.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. I believe each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage. This way, each state can make its own choice.

I already said that I believe each state should decide. I do not think the president should make a decision for the whole country. President Bush wants to ban gay marriage nationwide. I disagree with this. Each state should make its own decision.

I think some things should be left up to each state. The president does not live in every state, so he should not decide how each state runs itself. He will be out of office soon, and a new president may change the law. This decision should be left to each state, so it is clear what the people want.

No, I do not want a national ban on gay marriage.

I don't agree with school officials looking at what students post on the internet. 
However, if they are searching for things that might make the school safer, that's okay. 
If school officials want to know if students are doing something bad, they can find it on the internet, even if it's not on the school's website. 
So, it's not really private.

When people post things on the internet, they have to know that others will see them. 
This includes school officials. 
If school officials find something that might make the school safer, they can use that information. 

Schools have a job to keep students safe. 
They can look at things on the internet to do this. 
For example, they might want to know if students are drinking or smoking. 
If they find out about this, they can get the students in trouble.

Some people might think it's an invasion of privacy for school officials to look at things on the internet. 
However, if it makes the school safer, it's okay. 
School officials are just trying to keep students safe.

When students post things on the internet, they should be careful. 
It's easy to get in trouble if something they post is not good. 
It's like writing a letter that someone else can read. 
If you post something on the internet, it will stay there forever. 

School officials looked at things on the internet to keep the school safe. 
They wanted to make sure nothing bad would happen, like a school shooting. 
This is like practicing for emergencies. 
They want to be ready to keep students safe.

School officials are doing their job by looking at things on the internet. 
They want to make sure the school is a safe place for students. 
This is what they are supposed to do.

I have mixed feelings about the war. I think it was a big mistake. I was upset after nine eleven happened. I wanted to help. But now I think we went into the situation unprepared. We did not think about the results. We were angry and wanted revenge. 

We did not think about what would happen next. This caused problems. The people over there were already fighting with each other. We going there did not help. They could not fight with us because they were busy fighting with themselves.

I do not care about what happens over there now. I think they are not very organized. They do not think about making their country better. They just want us to leave. We should leave.

We went to war without a plan. We did not know what we were doing. We thought we could change their country. But we cannot change people. They will always be the same. We made a mistake by staying in that country.

We are not making progress. We are just making things worse. If we leave, their country will fall apart. We cannot stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should go home.

transformed_texts:
I think the Catholic Church needs to change some of its views. The Church is losing followers because many people think it is not accepting of some things. This includes same-sex marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these issues, but they may seem old-fashioned to some people.

If the Church were to change its views and think more like people today, it might not lose followers. Many people disagree with the Church's views and do not want to be a part of it. The Church is against abortion, which can be a problem for people who think abortion is okay. The same is true for gay marriage. If someone believes in gay marriage, they might not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.

I do not see why priests cannot be married or why there cannot be female priests. The Church says priests are married to God, but everyone else has a job and a family. So why can't priests have both? It is hard to know for sure if the Church would be different if priests could get married or if there were women priests.

I think the Church should be more open to new ideas. It should think about what people want and need. This might help the Church keep its followers.

I agree with same-sex marriage. I believe people are born gay or straight. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be blamed for their sexual orientation. It is not right to say one sex can marry but not the other.

I think it is not up to people to decide who can get married. We all have different choices in life. But it is not a choice if you are born gay. I was born straight, and my friend was born gay. We did not choose it.

I do not think the federal government should decide who can or cannot get married. Marriage and love are personal things. The government should not judge people's love.

People should be free to love whoever they want. We should not punish them for being different. The federal government should not interfere in people's personal lives. They should only worry about the country's security and laws.

I think same-sex marriage is a right. Everyone should be equal and have the same rights. We should not blame people for who they are.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 
There is no good reason not to. 
Many people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family, but this is not true. 
Gay couples are different, but that does not mean they are bad. 
It's like two different sides of the same coin. 
Heads will never be tails, but they are the same in many ways. 
Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. 
For example, property taxes and health care. 
If you are in a gay couple, your partner cannot visit you in the hospital because they are not considered family. 
This is unfair. 
Many scientific studies have been done, and they show that gay couples are just like straight couples. 
They have the same factors that contribute to happiness in their relationships. 
It's just a relationship, and it should be treated as such. 
Gay couples are not asking for the right to get married in a church. 
They are asking for a marriage certificate from the government. 
If the government allows a civil union, it should allow a marriage. 
Separate but unequal is not fair. 
Gay couples are the same in many ways, like the roles they play in their relationships. 
People worry about adoption issues and community issues, but these are not reasons to deny gay couples the right to marry. 
They also worry about children of gay couples, but this is not a good reason to deny them rights. 
Children of gay couples are just like any other children. 
They are treated unfairly in some places, like in New York City. 
There are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in public school. 
Parents protest to get their child removed from school because they are gay. 
But this is not fair. 
Parenting skills are the same for gay couples as for straight couples. 
The federal government should be involved in this issue and make gay marriage legal in every state. 
President Bush has strong views on this issue, but his views are based on his religion. 
This is not fair. 
The government should not make laws based on one person's or one group's morality. 
It should consider the morality of all Americans. 
The recent controversy over "Under God" in the Pledge of Allegiance shows that Americans have different ideas about morality. 
The government should not enforce one group's standards on the whole country. 
People are anti-gay and anti-gay marriage because they think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. 
But this is not true. 
The American Psychological Association says so. 
We should listen to research and studies, not just our neighbors and friends. 
If we did, we would see the world in a different way.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. This summer job has made me think. Just because a medicine is not allowed does not mean it has good qualities. My answer is no to making it available to the public. However, for medical reasons, I think yes. It is not true that a medicine is bad just because it is not allowed. Many medicines that are not allowed are used in the pharmacy because they have good qualities. We use medicines like oxycodone, Vicodin, and Percocet. These medicines are controlled. They are good and we use them. If we do not allow marijuana because of a bad image, that is not fair. I think we should accept its good qualities.

A bad image of marijuana exists because it is not allowed. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. It is not as bad as many other medicines. If we change our idea of marijuana being a bad thing, people might use it responsibly. They might use it for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed to adapt to the new century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on weekends. We would go to church together.

The church service is now thirty minutes long. People dress casually, even in summer when they come straight from the beach. Families arrive late, and some wear jeans and khakis. The atmosphere has become more casual.

As for other things, this is what I have noticed about the church I know. I do not know the church's politics and rules.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests and pedophilia, I do not think these problems could have been stopped. There are married men who become pedophiles, and their attraction to young children is a personal issue, not because of their marriage status.

When someone chooses to be a priest, it is their decision. Some religions allow their leaders to be married, but it does not prevent pedophilia. A person's sexuality is based on genetics. It is not something they become due to their upbringing. Genetics are something you are born with. You cannot hide it by getting married.

The church cannot prevent pedophilia. If they knew about it and tried to cover it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they were always aware of these problems.

I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was unhappy with the idea of going to war in Iraq. Many people were still sad about the attacks on the United States in September 2001. The US government said the Iraq war was connected to those attacks, but this was not true. They also said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but this was also not true.

I was unhappy that the US government lied to the people. Even someone who helped convince the world to go to war, Colin Powell, said he did not believe the evidence. This is not honest. I think it is wrong for government leaders to lie to people.

The US government does not respect the rules of the country. They want to do what they want, not what the rules say. Since 2001, they have been trying to make it harder for people to have their rights.

When the Bush family came into office, they wanted to go to war. One of their advisors said that the younger Bush wanted to get revenge against Saddam Hussein because of a problem from the past.

Now, the war has been going on for a long time. If the US leaves now, there could be a lot of fighting in Iraq and many more people could die. A group of countries, including the US, are trying to work together to fix the problem. They want countries in the area to help keep peace in Iraq. However, this could also cause problems in the long run because Iraq's leaders are not in control.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The people in charge do not have much power. There are many groups fighting for control, and this is causing problems.

I do not know what the solution is. I do not have a good answer to this problem.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. 

At first, I thought it was pointless because it was not officially declared as a war. I felt like the United States wanted revenge because Iraq was responsible for the 9/11 attacks. 

It is hard for me to keep up with the details of the war, but I know that we are trying to build democracy in Iraq so it can be like the United States. We also want their oil. However, staying there makes everyone unhappy.

If we stay, we will have to build democracy, which takes a long time. If we leave, they will be angry with us because we made their lives harder. 

I do not know what to say about this topic. This is one thing I do not understand.

I think the war should continue, but I do not think we should call it a war anymore. I think we use guns to show our power and to prove we are strong. 

I do not think it is fair to call it a war because it was not declared by Congress. We have to declare war to Congress to make it official.

I think it is a good idea to stay in Iraq and help them, but it is also a waste of resources. It is making President Bush look bad. 

The Vietnam War was also an undeclared war, and it was a waste of time. I do not want this war to be remembered as a meaningless war.

I want the war to end, but I also do not want to leave because I know people I care about are in Iraq. They have families and children who do not have a safe place to go to school. 

However, if we stay, we will be trying to change their culture to be like ours, which will make things worse. The Al-Kaida group will become stronger and more angry at the United States. 

I think this war will last for a long time.

I do not agree with making a law against something. It is not for a state to decide. The United States Constitution says the government and churches should be separate. This is a clear law.

Trying to make a law against this is not right. It would go against what the Constitution says. The people making this law are choosing one church's beliefs over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support it. They think it is wrong.

The separation of church and state is very important. It makes America a place where people can believe what they want. The founders of America wanted this. They made it clear in the Constitution.

I do not think the government should make a law about what churches can and cannot do. This would be the only law that takes away people's freedom, not the government's. It would be wrong to do this.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president's ideas about this law are personal, not good for the country. He is pushing for the law because of his own beliefs as a Catholic. This is not fair to other people who believe differently.

There is no good reason for this law. It will not help the economy. It might even help society. I do not think we should make a law like this. It is up to the churches to decide what is right, not the government.

The war in Iraq was a complicated situation. Some people think the government was not honest with Americans about why the war started. Before the war, the government suggested a connection between the invasion of Iraq and the 9/11 attacks. However, the two events are not closely related.

The United States invaded Iraq in 2003. I do not support war. I think the war was a mistake. It is like the Vietnam War. The US government learned from its mistakes in Vietnam, but it did not use this knowledge in Iraq.

Many American soldiers died in the war. This is very sad. The US government took out the Iraqi government, but it was not prepared for what happened after that. There was a power vacuum and chaos. The US tried to put a democratic government in Iraq, but this was a difficult process.

The US government should have known that the war would be hard to win. It was not a clear victory. We were fighting against the Iraqi people, not a regular army. Many people in Iraq did not want the US to be there. It's hard to defeat people who are fighting for their country.

I think the US government should not have gone to war. If it did, it should have planned carefully for all possible outcomes. The government was not well prepared for what happened after the Iraqi government was removed. We are still in Iraq and many American soldiers are still dying. The US is trying to train Iraqi soldiers and police, but this takes a long time.

The US government tried to make the American people believe that the war would be easy and successful. But democracy is not easy to create. It took the US many years to develop its own democratic government. The government should have been honest with the American people about the difficulties of creating a new government in Iraq.

It is hard to decide what to do in Iraq. We have been there for a long time, and we cannot just leave now. We took away the Iraqi government and their way of life. But we must also consider the many American soldiers who have died. We should try to finish what we started, but we must think about the cost.

One of the main reasons for the invasion was to make Iraq a democratic country. But why did we not do the same thing in other countries? The reason is often oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason for the war was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but these were never found. We did know that North Korea had weapons of mass destruction, but we did not invade that country.

I just hope that the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace there. But this does not seem likely.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. I have always thought this. I believe it is a personal preference. Many scientists now think that a person's sexual preference is not because of their family or society, but because of their biology. I think this is a good reason to give them equal rights.

I do not think the government should say who can get married. Marriage is a personal thing, not something the government should decide. I have friends who are gay but not married. They behave just like any other family. They walk their dogs and live like everyone else.

I do not think it is right for someone like President Bush to tell us what marriage means. I think this is too much power for one person. I have read and heard that some scientists think that being gay is because of a chemical in the brain that is not normal in most people.

I think there are many reasons why people are gay. It is not just because of how they were raised. If two people love each other, they should be able to get married without anyone bothering them.

It is not fair that gay couples have to get married in secret, like in Las Vegas. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. I think marriage should be a private thing, not something the whole country talks about.

When you put something on the internet, it is public information. Everyone can see it. You cannot keep it private. As a resident advisor, I have dealt with this problem before.

When you put something on the internet, people will think about you in a certain way. If you talk about violence or trouble, someone will notice. You cannot control what people think. The internet is seen by many people. If someone is your friend on Myspace or Facebook, they will see your bulletin.

The school must know about this. They must take action. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it. It's very important.

However, it's hard to know what to take seriously. Some people joke around. It could be a test gone wrong, like one we did in school for our sociology class. Or it could be something very serious.

In our situation, someone overheard someone talking and called the school. We found the person and looked at their Facebook page. They had some things on there that might be funny, but now they are serious.

The internet is public. If you don't want people to see something, don't put it there. You cannot control what people think. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at their personal pages. But if something is brought to their attention, they must take it seriously.

For example, if a teacher makes a fake account and friends students, that's not right. It's the same as spying. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to see their personal pictures or know what they are doing. It's not my job.

The school must take care of problems they find. But they should not be looking at students' private information.

I think the war has gone on for too long. The purpose was good at the start. We wanted to help a country with no fair government. But now I am not sure we are doing this for the right reasons. We may be fighting just to show that we are strong.

I think our motives were once good. We wanted to help a country with no freedom. But now I think we are fighting for other things. It started with a good reason, but now I am not sure. It makes me think of the past when we had problems with other leaders, like Saddam Hussein.

I think we made our point early on. Starting the war was a strong statement. But it has gone on for many years. I think that is too long. We should have stopped a long time ago.

If our goal was to help a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But I do not think that is why we are fighting now. I think we are fighting just to fight. We want to win, but we do not have a clear victory.

I think it is time to stop the war. The country we are fighting for will soon have to take care of itself. We should be spending our money on our own problems, like poverty and poor schools. We have many problems that need our help.

We are spending billions of dollars on the war. This money could be used for better things, like building roads or helping people get health care. We should be using our money to improve our own country, not to fight a war that we are not winning.

I think that is all I want to say about this.

I have a question. It is about online privacy. On the internet, it is easy to see information that people put on websites like Myspace. If you post something on the internet, it is likely that many people will see it.

Myspace is a website where you can list your friends. You need to be friends with someone to see their profile. But when you add someone as a friend, you are giving them permission to see your information. So, if you put something on the internet, you should understand that many people will see it.

It is hard to have someone check all students' online profiles to prevent problems. But if someone finds something bad by accident, is that good or bad? It depends on the situation. If someone is looking for something bad, it is not good. But if they just happened to see it by chance, it might be good that they did.

I have a Facebook account. It bothers me that people can see things about me. There was a TV show about a man who wanted to show how easy it is to get information. He got a girl's screen name and talked to her on instant messenger in just a minute. I wouldn't meet someone like that.

It is hard to know who can see your information online. You put your class schedule and photos, and people can know a lot about you. I limit what I put on my Facebook, but I also want to be able to talk to my friends.

My roommate told me that her high school banned Myspace. I am not sure if that was right. I don't know if they had the power to tell students they couldn't have Myspace.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. I want to talk about it. But I feel strange saying it now. Many people already said they were against the war from the start. I also said I was against it. However, I think it's not as important now.

I looked at many polls. People from the United States, Iraq, and all over the world said the war was a bad idea. More than 75% of the world's population thinks so. Most Iraqis, American soldiers, and even people from the United States agree with them.

The war started as a bad situation. It became worse. Now, pulling out is a difficult problem. The US and the Middle East have big cultural differences. It's hard to understand each other.

The US government thought they could bring democracy to Iraq easily. But Iraqis want to make their own decisions. They don't want democracy forced on them. Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but that's no reason to go to war.

Before going to war, we should think about the advantages and disadvantages. We should not invade a country and make it a disaster. The situation in Iraq is like quicksand. It's hard to get out.

I don't see a good reason to stay in Iraq any longer. The Iraqi people want us to leave. They even think we should leave now. We are trying to help them, but they're telling us to go. I think they know better.

If we ask the Iraqis if they want us to leave, and they say yes, then we can't blame them if things go wrong. If we decide to help them later, we can be seen as the good guys. But, unfortunately, it's hard to be the good guys in the Middle East.

I think the United States still has a problem with gender discrimination. This problem exists in many areas, but it is worse in some jobs than others. The issue is not just with women. Men can also face discrimination in certain jobs.

For example, some men have trouble getting promoted to higher positions because they work for women. This is because society has always seen men as the leaders. As a result, people have a hard time accepting men working for women.

In other areas like fashion, men who like fashion are often looked down upon. People think it's not a typical job for men. And if a man is a stay-at-home parent, society sees it as strange. They think he should be working and bringing home the money.

In some industries, people don't take men seriously if they are into fashion. They think that men who like fashion are different. This can make it hard for men to succeed in these jobs.

Gender discrimination is a problem in the United States. It will take a lot of time to change. But we can see some progress. More women are becoming leaders and getting accepted in the business world. More men are staying home to raise their children, and people are starting to see this as a good thing.

We need to promote the qualities of people who are often seen as different. We should not force people to accept these qualities, but instead, let them see the good things about these people. If we do this slowly, people will start to accept them.

It's not just about men and women. People from different places and with different backgrounds can also face discrimination. For example, someone from a farm who doesn't have perfect grammar can still be a great leader. But other people might look down on him because of his grammar.

In conclusion, the United States still has a problem with gender and social discrimination. But we can make progress if we do things slowly and promote the qualities of people who are often seen as different.

Decriminalizing marijuana means making it not a criminal offense. This means people who use it will get a ticket, not arrested. This is a good idea because it saves money for the government. They do not have to pay for court cases and jails. In a place like Denver, where people are open-minded, this is a good idea. The city can use the saved money for important things like education, social programs, and food for the homeless.

However, some people are concerned about the effects of marijuana. They think it should not be everywhere. Some people worry that if it is legalized, people will smoke it and drive, which is not safe. Many people still do not like the idea of smoking marijuana in public.

Alcohol and marijuana both have bad effects. Alcohol can hurt your ability to drive. Marijuana can affect how people live their lives. But people react differently to these substances. Some people can use them and be fine, while others have problems.

It is hard to say how people will react to marijuana because everyone is different. But one thing is true: both alcohol and marijuana have bad effects.

I agree with you. Here's why: Many things they do are traditional. They have done them for a long time. This is good. It's also important to change and adapt. 

A lot of Catholics go to church every week. They are very strict about how things are done. Sometimes, they look down on people who do not follow their rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

For example, my parents were not married in a Catholic church. My mom was a Catholic, and my dad was not. This was not because of my dad's religion, but because the church did not accept him.

Catholic teaching says to love others. But some Catholic practices go against this teaching. This is because they are out of date. They continue to follow these practices anyway.

I do not think this would influence me. I think it would be good if priests could marry. But I do not think this would stop them from hurting children. It is a different situation. They would probably still do bad things.

Some people who hurt children will do it no matter what. They will do it because they are hurting a child, not a partner. If they want to do something bad, they will do it. Getting married or not will not stop them.

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop these bad things from happening. They would probably still happen.

I am not sure about this problem. I do not have enough information to say who is right or wrong. This is a difficult issue. 

It is about the separation of church and state, and how to define marriage. It is hard to do this without hurting anyone's feelings. I think civil unions are a good idea. But I do not know if marriage should be a civil union.

Marriage is a very important thing. It is when two people join together. The government should not care about the type of marriage. It should just be a union of two people. 

Some people want to get married because of their church. But the government should not care about this. It is not fair to say some people can get married and others cannot.

The issue of gay marriage is similar. Two people who love each other should be able to join together. I do not think it is right to say no to this.

If many states agree on this, they should try to make it a law for the whole country. But making a change to the constitution to stop gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution should not be changed for a small issue like this.

I do not think it is important enough to change the constitution. It should only be changed for very big reasons. 

I do not think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. This is why I have mixed feelings about homosexuality. I have many gay friends, and I think being gay is a personal choice. However, I do not agree with this lifestyle. I do think it should be legal. I do not think it is a national issue. Instead, I believe each state should decide for itself.

I think some states are more democratic and some are more republican. Democratic states will probably support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you probably know how the people feel about gay marriage. If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect that decision. You chose to live there, so you should be willing to accept the laws.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. I believe each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage. This way, each state can make its own choice.

I already said that I believe each state should decide. I do not think the president should make a decision for the whole country. President Bush wants to ban gay marriage nationwide. I disagree with this. Each state should make its own decision.

I think some things should be left up to each state. The president does not live in every state, so he should not decide how each state runs itself. He will be out of office soon, and a new president may change the law. This decision should be left to each state, so it is clear what the people want.

No, I do not want a national ban on gay marriage.

I don't agree with school officials looking at what students post on the internet. 
However, if they are searching for things that might make the school safer, that's okay. 
If school officials want to know if students are doing something bad, they can find it on the internet, even if it's not on the school's website. 
So, it's not really private.

When people post things on the internet, they have to know that others will see them. 
This includes school officials. 
If school officials find something that might make the school safer, they can use that information. 

Schools have a job to keep students safe. 
They can look at things on the internet to do this. 
For example, they might want to know if students are drinking or smoking. 
If they find out about this, they can get the students in trouble.

Some people might think it's an invasion of privacy for school officials to look at things on the internet. 
However, if it makes the school safer, it's okay. 
School officials are just trying to keep students safe.

When students post things on the internet, they should be careful. 
It's easy to get in trouble if something they post is not good. 
It's like writing a letter that someone else can read. 
If you post something on the internet, it will stay there forever. 

School officials looked at things on the internet to keep the school safe. 
They wanted to make sure nothing bad would happen, like a school shooting. 
This is like practicing for emergencies. 
They want to be ready to keep students safe.

School officials are doing their job by looking at things on the internet. 
They want to make sure the school is a safe place for students. 
This is what they are supposed to do.

I have mixed feelings about the war. I think it was a big mistake. I was upset after nine eleven happened. I wanted to help. But now I think we went into the situation unprepared. We did not think about the results. We were angry and wanted revenge. 

We did not think about what would happen next. This caused problems. The people over there were already fighting with each other. We going there did not help. They could not fight with us because they were busy fighting with themselves.

I do not care about what happens over there now. I think they are not very organized. They do not think about making their country better. They just want us to leave. We should leave.

We went to war without a plan. We did not know what we were doing. We thought we could change their country. But we cannot change people. They will always be the same. We made a mistake by staying in that country.

We are not making progress. We are just making things worse. If we leave, their country will fall apart. We cannot stay there forever. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should go home.
